reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It's cheap and works well
reviews.reviewText: I used to use Secret gel deodorant for the longest time but noticed it wasn't lasting the whole day. I took a chance with this and am very pleased with it! It. The scent isn't overwhelming and it lasts all day because no one wants to be caught with stinky pits. 😂 The value is also way better than buying Secret deodorant, too. A two-pack of Mitchum is almost the same price as for one Secret. It also comes in a roll-on option which works great! I will continue to buy this so long as it works for me. 👍

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best on the market
reviews.reviewText: This is the only deodorant I will use, it works fantastic and smells so good nothing else out there holds a candle to this product I sweat a lot and it keeps me clean fresh and dry even on day 2 you can't go wrong with this product! (Light green women's dark green men's)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Mitchum Women's Deodorant
reviews.reviewText: I was not happy about the gel aspect, at first...I've tried numerous deodorants claiming to keep you dry, but none compare to the effectiveness and comfort of Mitchum Women's Deodorant. This product has been a game-changer in my daily routine, providing unparalleled dryness without any skin irritation.What sets Mitchum apart is its exceptional ability to keep me dry throughout the day. No matter how hectic my schedule gets, this deodorant delivers on its promise, leaving me feeling fresh and confident. The quick-drying formula ensures that I can get dressed without worrying about sticky residue or stains on my clothes.One of the most significant advantages is its sensitivity to skin. I've struggled with deodorants causing breakouts, but Mitchum has proven to be a gentle yet powerful solution. It's hypoallergenic and fragrance-free, making it perfect for those with sensitive skin.The fragrance-free aspect is particularly appreciated, allowing me to wear my favorite perfume without any conflicting scents. The absence of overpowering fragrances also makes it a great choice for those who prefer a more subtle approach to personal care.Mitchum Women's Deodorant has truly exceeded my expectations. If you're looking for a reliable deodorant that keeps you dry, treats your skin kindly, and dries fast, look no further. This product has earned its permanent spot in my beauty routine, and I can confidently say it's a must-try for anyone seeking a superior deodorant experience.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I give Mitchum for women 10 stars! It is very effective in controlling sweat and odor, long lasting, and smells great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. The product left me quite satisfied, it has a good aroma and the result is amazing. It dries somewhat slowly after applying it and can leave stains on the clothes you wear, so I recommend waiting a few minutes before putting on the clothes you chose, it doesn't make you sweat and is long lasting. I read some reviews where they found that the content comes out, well it worked for me once applied, I turn the wheel backwards, in the opposite direction and all the content returns and prevents it from spilling

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lasts a long time, very nice scent!
reviews.reviewText: Most deodorants did NOT work for me. Ive tried going natural, no aluminum, no whatever. I've tried almost everything, but not going to lie nothing really managed to keep me from smelling funky after a few hours or after I stepped outside in this Florida heat. I'm a sweaty girl! The only deodorant that truly helped me stay smelling good and dry was the Secret Derma+ Antiperspirant but that one was so expensive and not worth the price for the amount it gave me. I decided to try Mitchum and I don't think I'm switching any time soon! It's great, smells great, lasts all day, os a clear gel which i LOVE, and is a full sized deodorant! My only complaint is that when I close the lid, the product (the gel) comes out a bit and makes a mess. But I dont really care about that. Great antiperspirant!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great product that works
reviews.reviewText: Very well priced. I will buy again

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best long lasting deodorant EVER!
reviews.reviewText: Wow! I’ve been using this for over 3 months now. Best decision of my life! It smells great & lasts all day. I’ve tried everything from Dove to Old Spice, but those weren’t strong enough for me. This gel deodorant will keep you smelling fresh all day. Only downside is it is a bit sticky but that’s not that bad. GET IT!!!!! 💗
I liked the two packages of antiperspirant and they were exactly what I ordered.

I used this deodorant years ago. Can't remember why I switched to another type. Tried it again after seeing it advertised. I will not switch again. This is still, after all these years, a really effective, long lasting deodorant. Easy to use, leaves no residue on your clothes or under arms and scent does not precede you into a room. I am hooked again on this product. Lasts a long time because you use just a little bit.

reviews.reviewTitle: Do not buy if you sweat!!
reviews.reviewText: Would rate negative stars if I could. The gel version does NOT dry and is sticky. Had to take a shower to remove it. The smell is toxic. Do NOT buy. Wasted $25 on this garbage.
No leí con cuidado y no vi que esta versión si tiene aluminio, su versión sin aluminio es muy buena. Estos cumplen, pero al tener aluminio da igual si te compras otra marca x, hacen lo mismo.
